mapper.insert: insert into store (num, owner, storeName, storeAddr, openingTime, storeOpen, category, regdate) values(store_seq.nextval, #{email}, 'Default', 'Default', '00:00 ~ 24:00', 'no', 'Default', sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select result1.*, rownum as rnum from (select * from store where owner=#{owner}) result1) where rnum=#{num}
